sentence.Network_en: Dogs love splashing in mud and hippos wallow in it.
sentence.Network_cn: 狗喜欢在泥水洼里扑腾，河马则喜欢在其中打滚撒欢儿。

sentence.Network_en: I stumbled through mud to a yard strewn with straw.
sentence.Network_cn: 我跌跌撞撞地趟过泥地来到一个堆满麦秆的场院。

sentence.Network_en: They spent much of their time knee-deep in mud.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在齐膝深的泥地里费了好长时间。

means.word_mean: 1. covered with or as if with mud;

auth_sentence.content: But it has degenerated into a mud-slinging smear campaign.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it has degenerated into a mud-slinging smear campaign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it has degenerated into a mud-slinging smear campaign.

auth_sentence.content: A ditch in which weeds stood...in mud and scum.
auth_sentence.res_content: A ditch in which weeds stood...in mud and scum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A ditch in which weeds stood...in mud and scum.

auth_sentence.content: All draggled with the mud and rain he stood.
auth_sentence.res_content: All draggled with the mud and rain he stood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: All draggled with the mud and rain he stood.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
